name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 30, students from Southwest University for Nationalities in Chengdu said that four people died on campus within two days. As a result, the topic of Southwest University for Nationalities briefly became a hot search on Weibo on the morning of the 30th, and then the news was blocked.
The specific cause of death is unknown, but the school repeatedly emphasizes safety regulations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, at the school anniversary celebration of Nantong University Affiliated Middle School, students performed and rehearsed the famous "Dance of the Flower Goddess" by Nero in "Genshin Impact", but were criticized by the principal, "This is Japanese culture. What we want is the positive Chinese culture. This is not a stage for Japanese people."
The frustrated expressions of the students performing can be seen in the video.
It is reported that this is a character and dance created in a Chinese game based on Indian and Persian mythology.
Some netizens questioned whether this is cultural confidence or cultural inferiority?

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 31, the China Earthquake Networks Center determined that a magnitude 3.4 earthquake occurred in Tonghai County, Yuxi City, Yunnan Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 30, a reporter was beaten by three unidentified people while investigating the "two teachers drowning" incident in Zhijin County, Bijie City, Guizhou Province.
According to the family members, the two teachers went to the river to pick up pebbles to decorate the campus in order to welcome the leaders' inspection, but they were suddenly washed away by the water release of the hydropower station.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On May 24, Apple was fined 200,000 yuan by the Beijing Dongcheng District Market Supervision Administration for publishing false advertisements.
It is reported that on February 14, 2022, the commercial advertisement for the Macbook Air notebook sold by Apple claimed that "the M1 chip has the fastest central processing unit we have ever built" and other content. After investigation, Apple launched the Macbook Pro equipped with M1 Pro and M1 Max chips in October 2021, and the running speed is up to 70% higher than that of M1. Therefore, the central processing unit equipped with the M1 chip at the time of the incident was not the fastest built by Apple. In accordance with the relevant provisions of the "Advertising Law of the People's Republic of China", the Beijing Dongcheng District Market Supervision Administration imposed corresponding administrative penalties.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens submit articles to supplement the chaos of internships in domestic universities

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, a convenience store in Xiangyang, Hubei, had a decoration at the door that looked like the Japanese flag. After being reported by citizens, the local urban management law enforcement team took it down.
In addition, the law enforcement officers also said that the night shift team went to the store three times that day, but it was not open, so it was impossible to carry out propaganda and education.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens added that the principal had previously organized a welcome event for a Japanese group to visit Tongda High School.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, a large number of videos and articles about "missing the ten years of Hu Jintao and Wen Jiabao" have appeared on major social platforms within the Great Firewall. Some bloggers have made videos about this phenomenon, believing that "there must be something wrong when things are abnormal", which is a metaphor for the present, and was refuted by netizens.
Comment area Observation: The main reasons why the older young people born in the 1990s and 2000s who experienced the Hu Jintao and Wen Jiabao era miss Hu Jintao and Wen Jiabao are: the abolition of agricultural tax, no turmoil, a more reasonable income-price ratio, more relaxed online speech, and a more hopeful mental outlook of the people, etc.
A large number of netizens pointed out that the reason why the up-host has to hide behind the mask and be weird to prevent netizens from missing him is because the current society does not even have this kind of freedom of speech to "put the problem on the table"
At the same time, some netizens support the up-host's point of view, believing that the underworld and corruption problems were more serious during the Hu Jintao and Wen Jiabao era, and the economic level was not as good as it is now, and they prefer the present.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
On May 31, a Nankai University netizen was bullied by a patriotic V because he wrote "Dedicated to all women" in the acknowledgments of his graduation thesis. His personal information was exposed and his mobile phone number was maliciously bombarded. Then people began to try to prove that he had committed academic fraud and accused Nankai University of being a "traitor."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
Some netizens found that the Netflix show "The Man-Made Waver" which was previously very popular in China has been completely deleted from all platforms in China.
It is reported that "The Man-Made Waver" is a workplace drama about Taiwan's political arena and elections. Although the TV series was blocked in China as soon as it was launched, it still couldn't stop the enthusiasm of the audience, and some clips and theme songs were still circulated on the Internet in China.

Netizen contribution
Some players found that on the CSGO Perfect Platform, the word "平" has become a sensitive word. Not only has "平局" become "*局", but even the Perfect Platform's own brand name is not immune.
